contents: <sup>6</sup>My restaurant will _________ because of my experience. <sup>7</sup>I know all the details and understand the jobs and needs of all my workers. <sup>8</sup>I understand what customers want and how to make them feel welcome. <sup>9</sup>_________, remembering a face and greeting someone by name goes a lot farther than remembering the capital of South Dakota. <sup>10</sup>I’ve had an education from experience, and that’s something you can’t put a price tag on.
